select a.examine_name as examineName, a.EXAMINE_SUBJECT_ID as examineSubjectId, a.EXAMINE_SUBJECT_NAME as examineSubjectName, '及格' as level from XLGL_EXAM_EXAMINE a where a.status= '0' and a.OVER_STATUS = '1'
and a.EXAMINE_SUBJECT_ID = #{subjectId}

select row_number()over (order by totalFraction desc)as ranking, replyUserId, replyUserName, totalFraction , fractionSum from ( select sum(b.FRACTIONSUM) as totalFraction, b.REPLY_USER_ID as replyUserId, b.REPLY_USER_NAME as replyUserName, sum(a.EXAMINE_ALL_NUMBER)as fractionSum from XLGL_EXAM_EXAMINE a join XLGL_EXAM_MAIN_ANSWER b on a.id=b.examine_id where b.ISNOTEXAM = '1' and a.status= '0' and a.OVER_STATUS = '1' group by b.REPLY_USER_ID,b.REPLY_USER_NAME)
